front.title: Multiplexing RTP and Data Channels over QUIC

abstract.t: This document defines a multiplexing scheme for using RTP over QUIC and QUIC Data Channels in a single QUIC connection. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/mengelbart/draft-engelbart-multiplex-roq-qdc.
